page.title: 16INTERVIEW WITH MRS. BROWN
page.content: Mrs. Joan Brown was born in Little Cornard and lived there for 20 years. She moved to Great Cornard and has lived there for 34 years. Mrs. Brown says that there were lots more woods round here when she was young.Lots of people have moved here from London over the years. Mrs. Brown went to the old school as a girl and enjoyed it.Her best subject was English. She played hockey and rounders there. She liked races best though.In the old school everyone took packed lunches.There were just over 100 children when she was there.Mrs. Brown didnt stay on, she left when she was 14 and became a cook in a hospital. .After that she became a cleaning lady at Wells Hall School.Mrs Brown has two children Elizabeth and Wendy.She enjoys her work
